casebody.data:
In the Matter of M.B.
appealed by Niamalikia R. No. 216P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2006. Robert W. Ewing, Winston-Salem, for Niamalikia R. Alan Edmonds, Charlotte, for Mecklenburg County DSS. Alexandria S. Gruber, Appellate Coordinator, for Guardian Ad Litem.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 25th day of April 2006 by Respondent (Niamalikia R.) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th day of August 2006."
